pages.privacy-policy: CasinoCrooners - Privacy Policy CasinoCrooners HOME ABOUT US Performance Contact Privacy Policy CasinoCrooners respects the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains what information we collect from you, how we use it, and under what circumstances we may disclose it. Information We Collect We may collect the following information from you: Information you provide voluntarily, such as your email address if you sign up for our newsletter. Information collected automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies, which may include data about your browsing activity on our website. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: To improve the content and functionality of our website. To send you emails about our latest news and promotions (if you have opted in). To personalize your experience on our website. Disclosure of Your Information We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except in the following cases: To comply with legal or regulatory requirements. To protect the security of our website and users. Your Choices You can choose to opt out of receiving promotional emails from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those emails. You can also manage your cookie preferences through your web browser settings. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website can guarantee complete data security. The CasinoCrooners website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline CasinoCrooners DISCLAIMERS PRIVACY & POLICY TERMS & CONDITIONS
